doctor.name: Dr. Md. Minhajul Hasan
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Minhajul Hasan is a Vascular Surgeon in Chittagong. His qualification is MBBS (CMC), BCS (Health), FCPS (Surgery), MS (CVTS). He is a Resident Surgeon (Vascular Surgery) at Chittagong Medical College Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Parkview Hospital, Chittagong. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Minhajul Hasan at Parkview Hospital, Chittagong is 6.30pm to 9.30pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.name: Dr. Md. Jamal Uddin
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Jamal Uddin is a Orthopedic Surgeon in Chittagong. His qualification is MBBS, MS (ORTHO). He is a Assistant Professor, Orthopedic Surgery at Chittagong Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Chittagong. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Jamal Uddin at Popular Diagnostic Center, Chittagong is 3pm to 6pm (Closed: Thursday & Friday).

chamber.address: 20/B, K. B. Fazlul Kader Road, Panchlaish, Chattogram
